alert.note: Alert for Antelope Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 25 at 4:45PM PST until December 26 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts to 45 mph, except 25 to 40 mph with local gusts to 55 mph in the foothills. Winds becoming west late tonight into Sunday morning. * WHERE...Antelope Valley. * WHEN...Until noon PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Major roadways that will be impacted by the strong winds include highways 14 and 138. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
